channel.title: (Help) Error connecting to server
channel.description: Hey guys ive been hosting my server for 2 week now and nown and again i get error connecting to my own server but others can get on fine and i dont understand this issue does anyone know what causes it and how to fix because this is the no1 hate for rsps and its really getting me down please get back to me :S :(

item.title: (Help) Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

The reason for you’re client not working is because it is missing mapfloors.txt or whatever the error said, you can fix this by redownloading and placing in C:.

Read full topic

item.description:
@maxw30 wrote:

If my source and client dont have my no-ip in then how are others meant to connect to my server? :S

item.title: (Help) Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @ox_y_ge_n ox y ge n
item.description:
@ox_y_ge_n wrote:

your source should be running on 0.0.0.0 not your ip ? it’s the client IP that should change,

Go to Client, client.java and search “server =” and change it to “server = 127.0.0.01” try that.

Read full topic

item.title: (Help) Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @maxw30 maxw30
item.description:
@maxw30 wrote:

Yes it randomley wont let me for some reason and my source is running on my no-ip and in my clients its running on 127.0.0.1 also my client wont work for some reason its like broke which if anyone could please tv me i would be very greatful and give rep to whom can fix this!

Read full topic

item.title: (Help) Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @ox_y_ge_n ox y ge n
item.description:
@ox_y_ge_n wrote:

umm… i was going to say your IP, your friends use your No-ip but, if your hosting it yourself (home hosting) then go into client.java and change the ip to “127.0.0.1”

if this didn’t help sorry :L

Read full topic

item.title: (Help) Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

So what you’re saying is randomly it won’t let you (and only you) connect to the server?

Are you logging in through localhost/127.0.0.1?

Usually that problem can be resolved by letting the players connect through you’re IP and you connect through localhost.

Read full topic
